text: int main ( ) { int i , j ; int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int * * a ; a = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; int * size ; size = ( int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) { scanf ( "%d" , & size [ i ] ) ; a [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( size [ i ] * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < size [ i ] ; ++ j ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } int * count ; count = ( int * ) calloc ( n , sizeof ( int ) ) ; int * * b ; b = ( int * * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( int * ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) { b [ i ] = ( int * ) calloc ( size [ i ] , sizeof ( int ) ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; ++ i ) { b [ i ] [ 0 ] = 1 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < size [ i ] ; ++ j ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] >= a [ i ] [ j - 1 ] ) { b [ i ] [ j ] = b [ i ] [ j - 1 ] + 1 ; } else b [ i ] [ j ] = 1 ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < size [ i ] ; ++ j ) { count [ i ] += b [ i ] [ j ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , count [ i ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
